short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can use this Notes extension for daily usage securely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy to use Notes extension helps you store your daily notes.
Simply install and start using this extension.
Open Notes Extension and start adding your stuff, it will save automatically all the changes.
Whenever you want to clear all the changes simply click on clear will clear all the saved informaton.
Saves data offline in you brower storage.
